notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities on cast.
Knocks units back at a speed of 833.33. Knockback distance is always 250, no matter how far the unit is from the center.
Units are not disabled during the knockback. They can still turn, attack, cast abilities, and use items. Channeling spells are not interrupted.
Can knock units over impassable terrain. Destroys trees within 100 radius of affected units upon landing.
The slow and knockback debuffs are placed at the same time, so the slow effectively lasts for 2.7 seconds.
Havoc first applies the knockback, then the slow, then the damage.
abilities.description: Knocks back enemies in 400 range around you, slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 + 1x your str as magical damage.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
name: Havoc Hammer
description: Tier 4 Neutral Drop The same item may drop once per team. A maximum of 5 item per tier can drop for each team. Only one consumable neutral item may drop per tier for each team.
